dc_description_s: The MDOT Region layer represents MDOTs seven regions that each handle transportation-related construction, maintenance and programs within each regions geographic boundaries. Region offices are managed by professional engineers who are trained to direct and oversee the transportation activities and programs of their respective regions. Please see theMDOT Metadata Formfor additional information.Update Cycle: MDOT Regions are static boundaries.;Coverage: This inventory is complete in its coverage.;Contact: Kevin McKnight,mcknightk@michigan.gov
dc_publisher_sm: State of Michigan GIS Open Data
dct_isPartOf_sm: State of Michigan Open Data Portal
